atk-abh02a10:2_0: 486. Idāni tadanantare maggavibhaṅge ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggotiādi sabbaṁ saccavibhaṅge
atk-abh02a10:2_2: dassite dutiyanayepi sammādiṭṭhiṁ bhāveti vivekanissitantiādi sabbaṁ bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge
atk-abh02a10:2_3: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ. Evamidaṁ dvinnampi nayānaṁ vasena suttantabhājanīyaṁ lokiyalokuttaramissakameva kathitaṁ.
atk-abh02a10:4_0: 490. Abhidhammabhājanīye ‘ariyo’ti avatvā aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti vuttaṁ. Evaṁ avuttepi
atk-abh02a10:4_1: ayaṁ ariyo eva. Yathā hi muddhābhisittassa rañño muddhābhisittāya deviyā kucchismiṁ
atk-abh02a10:4_2: jāto putto rājaputtoti avuttepi rājaputtoyeva hoti, evamayampi ariyoti avuttepi ariyo
atk-abh02a10:4_3: evāti veditabbo. Sesamidhāpi saccavibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a10:5_0: 493. Pañcaṅgikavārepi aṭṭhaṅgikoti avuttepi aṭṭhaṅgiko eva veditabbo. Lokuttaramaggo
atk-abh02a10:5_1: hi pañcaṅgiko nāma natthi. Ayamettha ācariyānaṁ samānatthakathā. Vitaṇḍavādī panāha
atk-abh02a10:5_2: – ‘‘lokuttaramaggo aṭṭhaṅgiko nāma natthi, pañcaṅgikoyeva hotī’’ti. So ‘‘suttaṁ āharāhī’’ti
atk-abh02a10:5_3: vutto addhā aññaṁ apassanto imaṁ mahāsaḷāyatanato suttappadesaṁ āharissati ‘‘yā tathābhūtassa
atk-abh02a10:5_4: diṭṭhi, sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi. Yo tathābhūtassa saṅkappo, vāyāmo, sati, yo tathābhūtassa
atk-abh02a10:5_5: samādhi, svāssa hoti sammāsamādhi. Pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ ājīvo
atk-abh02a10:6_0: Tato ‘‘etassa anantaraṁ suttapadaṁ āharā’’ti vattabbo. Sace āharati iccetaṁ kusalaṁ,
atk-abh02a10:6_1: no ce āharati sayaṁ āharitvā ‘‘evamassāyaṁ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṁ
atk-abh02a10:6_2: gacchatī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.431) ‘‘iminā te satthusāsanena vādo bhinno; lokuttaramaggo
atk-abh02a10:6_3: pañcaṅgiko nāma natthi, aṭṭhaṅgikova hotī’’ti vattabbo.
atk-abh02a10:7_0: Imāni pana tīṇi aṅgāni pubbe parisuddhāni vattanti, lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe parisuddhatarāni
atk-abh02a10:7_1: honti. Atha ‘pañcaṅgiko maggo’ti idaṁ kimatthaṁ gahitanti? Atirekakiccadassanatthaṁ.
atk-abh02a10:7_2: Yasmiñhi samaye micchāvācaṁ pajahati, sammāvācaṁ pūreti, tasmiṁ samaye sammākammantasammāājīvā
atk-abh02a10:7_3: natthi. Imāni pañcakārāpakaṅgāneva micchāvācaṁ pajahanti; sammāvācā pana sayaṁ virativasena
atk-abh02a10:7_4: pūreti. Yasmiṁ samaye micchākammantaṁ pajahati, sammākammantaṁ pūreti, tasmiṁ samaye
atk-abh02a10:7_5: sammāvācāsammāājīvā natthi. Imāni pañca kārāpakaṅgāneva micchākammantaṁ pajahanti;
atk-abh02a10:7_6: sammākammanto pana sayaṁ virativasena pūreti. Yasmiṁ samaye micchāājīvaṁ pajahati,
atk-abh02a10:7_7: sammāājīvaṁ pūreti, tasmiṁ samaye sammāvācāsammākammantā natthi. Imāni pañca kārāpakaṅgāneva
atk-abh02a10:7_8: micchāājīvaṁ pajahanti; sammāājīvo pana sayaṁ virativasena pūreti. Imaṁ etesaṁ pañcannaṁ
atk-abh02a10:7_9: kārāpakaṅgānaṁ kiccātirekataṁ dassetuṁ pañcaṅgiko maggoti gahitaṁ. Lokuttaramaggo
atk-abh02a10:7_10: pana aṭṭhaṅgikova hoti, pañcaṅgiko nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a10:8_0: ‘‘Yadi sammāvācādīhi saddhiṁ aṭṭhaṅgikoti vadatha, catasso sammāvācācetanā, tisso
atk-abh02a10:8_1: sammākammantacetanā, satta sammāājīvacetanāti imamhā cetanābahuttā kathaṁ muccissatha?
atk-abh02a10:8_2: Tasmā pañcaṅgikova lokuttaramaggo’’ti. ‘‘Cetanābahuttā ca pamuccissāma; aṭṭhaṅgikova
atk-abh02a10:8_3: lokuttaramaggoti ca vakkhāma’’. ‘‘Tvaṁ tāva mahācattārīsakabhāṇako hosi, na hosī’’ti
atk-abh02a10:8_4: pucchitabbo. Sace ‘‘na homī’’ti vadati, ‘‘tvaṁ abhāṇakattā na jānāsī’’ti vattabbo.
atk-abh02a10:8_5: Sace ‘‘bhāṇakosmī’’ti vadati, ‘‘suttaṁ āharā’’ti vattabbo. Sace suttaṁ āharati iccetaṁ
atk-abh02a10:8_6: kusalaṁ, no ce āharati sayaṁ uparipaṇṇāsato āharitabbaṁ –
atk-abh02a10:9_0: ‘‘Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammāvācā? Sammāvācaṁpahaṁ, bhikkhave, dvāyaṁ vadāmi – atthi,
atk-abh02a10:9_1: bhikkhave, sammāvācā sāsavā puññabhāgiyā upadhivepakkā; atthi, bhikkhave, sammāvācā
atk-abh02a10:10_0: ‘‘Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammāvācā sāsavā puññabhāgiyā upadhivepakkā? Musāvādā veramaṇī,
atk-abh02a10:10_1: pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī, samphappalāpā veramaṇī – ayaṁ,
atk-abh02a10:11_0: ‘‘Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammāvācā ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgā? Yā kho, bhikkhave,
atk-abh02a10:11_1: ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṁ bhāvayato catūhi vacīduccaritehi
atk-abh02a10:11_2: ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī – ayaṁ, bhikkhave, sammāvācā ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgā…pe….
atk-abh02a10:12: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammākammanto? Sammākammantaṁpahaṁ, bhikkhave, dvayaṁ vadāmi…pe… upadhivepakko.
atk-abh02a10:13: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammākammanto ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro…pe….
atk-abh02a10:14: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo? Sammāājīvaṁpahaṁ, bhikkhave, dvāyaṁ vadāmi…pe… upadhivepakko.
atk-abh02a10:15_0: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo? Yā kho, bhikkhave,
atk-abh02a10:15_1: ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṁ bhāvayato micchāājīvā
atk-abh02a10:15_2: ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī – ayaṁ, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro
atk-abh02a10:16_0: Evamettha catūhi vacīduccaritehi, tīhi kāyaduccaritehi, micchājīvato cāti ekekāva
atk-abh02a10:16_1: virati ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgāti vuttā. ‘‘Kuto ettha cetanābahuttaṁ? Kuto
atk-abh02a10:16_2: pañcaṅgiko maggo? Idaṁ te suttaṁ akāmakassa lokuttaramaggo aṭṭhaṅgikoti dīpeti’’.
atk-abh02a10:16_3: Sace ettakena sallakkheti iccetaṁ kusalaṁ, no ce sallakkheti aññānipi kāraṇāni āharitvā
atk-abh02a10:17_0: ‘‘Yasmiṁ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati, samaṇopi
atk-abh02a10:17_1: tattha na upalabbhati…pe… imasmiṁ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo
atk-abh02a10:17_2: upalabbhati; idheva , subhadda, samaṇo…pe… suññā parappavādā samaṇehi aññehīti (dī. ni. 2.214).
atk-abh02a10:18: Aññesupi anekesu suttasatesu aṭṭhaṅgikova maggo āgato. Kathāvatthuppakaraṇepi vuttaṁ –
atk-abh02a10:21_0: ‘‘Attheva suttantoti’’? ‘‘Āmantā’’‘‘tena hi aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo’’ti. Sace pana ettakenāpi
atk-abh02a10:21_1: saññattiṁ na gacchati, ‘‘gaccha, vihāraṁ pavisitvā yāguṁ pivāhī’’ti uyyojetabbo.
atk-abh02a10:21_2: Uttarimpana kāraṇaṁ vakkhatīti aṭṭhānametaṁ. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-abh02a10:22_0: Nayā panettha gaṇetabbā. Aṭṭhaṅgikamaggasmiñhi ekato pucchitvā ekato vissajjane catūsu
atk-abh02a10:22_1: maggesu cattāri nayasahassāni vibhattāni. Pañcaṅgikamagge ekato pucchitvā ekato vissajjane
atk-abh02a10:22_2: cattāri; pāṭiyekkaṁ pucchitvā pāṭiyekkaṁ vissajjane cattāri cattārīti pañcasu aṅgesu
atk-abh02a10:22_3: vīsati. Iti purimāni aṭṭha imāni ca vīsatīti sabbānipi maggavibhaṅge aṭṭhavīsati
atk-abh02a10:22_4: nayasahassāni vibhattāni. Tāni ca kho nibbattitalokuttarāni kusalāneva. Vipāke pana
atk-abh02a10:25_0: 504. Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva maggaṅgānaṁ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo. Ārammaṇattikesu
atk-abh02a10:25_1: pana sabbānipetāni appamāṇaṁ nibbānaṁ ārabbha pavattito appamāṇārammaṇāneva, na maggārammaṇāni.
atk-abh02a10:25_2: Neva hi maggo na phalaṁ maggaṁ ārammaṇaṁ karoti. Sahajātahetuvasena panettha kusalāni
atk-abh02a10:25_3: maggahetukāni; vīriyaṁ vā vīmaṁsaṁ vā jeṭṭhakaṁ katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipatīni;
atk-abh02a10:25_4: chandacittajeṭṭhikāya maggabhāvanāya na vattabbāni maggādhipatīnīti; phalakālepi na vattabbāneva.
atk-abh02a10:26_0: Atītādīsu ekārammaṇabhāvenapi na vattabbāni; nibbānassa pana bahiddhādhammattā bahiddhārammaṇāni
atk-abh02a10:26_1: nāma hontīti evametasmiṁ pañhāpucchakepi nibbattitalokuttarāneva maggaṅgāni kathitāni.
atk-abh02a10:26_2: Sammāsambuddhena hi suttantabhājanīyasmiṁyeva lokiyalokuttarāni maggaṅgāni kathitāni;
atk-abh02a10:26_3: abhidhammabhājanīye pana pañhāpucchake ca lokuttarānevāti evamayaṁ maggavibhaṅgopi
